Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api.request.body

Class RequestBodyFactory

java.lang.Object
ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api.request.body.RequestBodyFactory
public final class RequestBodyFactory extends Object
Creates instances of RequestBody.

    • body

      public static RequestBody<Void> body()
      Creates empty body of http request.
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<byte[]> body(byte[] body, int length, int offset)
      Creates binary body of http request.
      Parameters:
      body - is a full binary array
      length - is length of a sub-array to send
      offset - the offset of the first byte
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<byte[]> body(byte[] body)
      Creates binary body of http request.
      Parameters:
      body - is a binary content
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<File> body(File file)
      Creates file body of http request.
      Parameters:
      file - is a file to send
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<File> body(Path path)
      Creates file body of http request.
      Parameters:
      path - is a path to a file to send
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(String body, Charset encoding)
      Creates encoded string body of http request.
      Parameters:
      body - is an original string content
      encoding - is necessary encoding of of a body
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(String body)
      Creates UTF-8 string body of http request.
      Parameters:
      body - is an original string content
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

      public static RequestBody<InputStream> body(InputStream body)
      Creates a stream body of http request.
      Parameters:
      body - is an input stream body
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<Supplier<InputStream>> body(Supplier<InputStream> body)
      Creates a body of http request.
      Parameters:
      body - is a body of http request. It is considered that an input stream is created at the moment when http request is sent
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(FormParameter... formParameters)
      Creates a body of application/x-www-form-urlencoded format.
      Parameters:
      formParameters - array of form parameters
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(Document body)
      Creates a body of http request. W3C Document is used as string content
      Parameters:
      body - is a document that is used as a request body
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(Document body, Transformer transformer)
      Creates a body of http request. W3C Document is used as string content
      Parameters:
      body - is a document that is used as a request body
      transformer - is a document transformer
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(org.jsoup.nodes.Document body)
      Creates a body of http request. Html body is used as string content
      Parameters:
      body - is a document that is used as a request body
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper, Object body)
      Creates a body of http request. An object is transformed into json/xml string body.
      Parameters:
      mapper - is an instance of ObjectMapper that is used to transform object into json/xml string
      body - object to be serialized
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody

    • body

      public static RequestBody<String> body(DefaultMapper mapper, Object body)
      Creates a body of http request. An object is transformed into json/xml string body.
      Parameters:
      mapper - creates/gets an instance of ObjectMapper that is used by default to transform object into json/xml string.
      body - object to be serialized
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody
      See Also:
      • DefaultMapper
      • DefaultJsonObjectMapper
      • DefaultXmlObjectMapper

    • body

      public static RequestBody<BodyPart[]> body(String boundary, BodyPart... bodyParts)
      Creates a body of http request. The body consists of several parts.
      Parameters:
      boundary - is a separator between parts
      bodyParts - parts of a complex body
      Returns:
      an instance of RequestBody
